structure.unit: Proprietors Of Wharves, Real Estate Lying In Common, And General Fields

law.catch_line: Non Use Of Land; Liability For Maintenance Or Assessment On Fence
law.text: A proprietor shall not, so long as he declines to cultivate his land or use it for pasturing, for the growth of wood or otherwise, be required to maintain any part of the fence or to pay any assessment on account of his land.
